detailed_repos.name: dnd-rag-helper
detailed_repos.description: Local RAG-Based AI Assistant for D&D 5e. An advanced, privacy-focused tabletop companion built using LangChain, Ollama, and ChromaDB. Enables Dungeon Masters and players to query the D&D 5e rulebook ecosystem with zero cloud dependency.

detailed_repos.name: dm-hud
detailed_repos.description: Real-time AI-powered assistant for D&D 5.5e Dungeon Masters. Automatic entity tracking, character milestones, and session reports. Uses Claude AI and Deepgram transcription. Always-listening 'second brain' that creates entity cards, tracks state in real-time, records milestones, and generates session reports.

detailed_repos.name: DnDbug
detailed_repos.description: AI-driven storytelling assistant for Game Masters to plan, structure, and run D&D sessions. Built with React + Vite + Tailwind + Express + OpenAI (GPT-4o). Two-layer architecture: Macro (scene chains) and Detail (scene content). Features Story Background Generator, Character Generator, Macro Chain System, Scene Detail Generator with narrative structure.

detailed_repos.name: DND_DM
detailed_repos.description: Python-based D&D 5e assistant (DragonMaster) with AI-powered Dungeon Master, cinematic TTS narration, and manual speech-to-text player input. Uses Ollama LLM, edge-tts/pyttsx3, openai-whisper. Features dice rolling, party/HP tracking, combat management, and initiative tracking.

detailed_repos.name: natural20-rag
detailed_repos.description: Advanced RAG-based AI assistant for D&D 5e. Uses LlamaIndex, Ollama (llama3.1:8b), nomic-embed-text, and Qdrant vector DB. Provides precise rule interpretations with contextualized citations from Player's Handbook. Includes Arize Phoenix observability. Fully local and private environment.

additional_repos.name: ai-dm-assistant
additional_repos.description: AI Dungeon Master assistant for Session Prep

additional_repos.name: gary
additional_repos.description: Gary the Dungeon Master AI Assistant

additional_repos.name: DnD-RAG-Chatbot
additional_repos.description: AI-powered assistant that learns D&D 5e rules from PDFs using RAG pipeline

additional_repos.name: NLP_RPG_Narrative_Assistant
additional_repos.description: NLP-powered virtual assistant for Dungeon Masters to generate coherent narratives for RPG one-shot sessions
